Dialogue.Page: That was one heck of a crash, huh?
Guess I'm rustier than I thought. Doing nothing but playing flute for how many loops will do that to your piloting skills.
Uh.. there's a whole lot of beeping going on.. No problem, no problem - I got this. Gimme a sec, just gotta tape the reactor up a little here, a little there...
Um, it's still beeping. You see anything wrong with the ship out there, time buddy?
Actually, this thing's an older generation ship - you might just blow it up trying to help. Maybe just keep your distance, time buddy.
Nope, I can't figure it out. She's gonna blow.
Hm. See you next loop, time buddy!
Well, we know how this goes. Maybe I should stop trying to land perfectly on the landing pad...
.. Nahh. See you next loop, time buddy!
The Gabbro Flight Express is obligated to encourage you to vacate the area as soon as possible, loyal passenger.
Hm? What about me? A Hearthian always goes down with their ship, time buddy.
Dying like this - kinda beats getting charred by the supernova. <Pause/> At least I don't have to hear the other travelers.. y'know. Fade out.
At least this is more on my own terms, y'know?
No, seriously - get to safety, hatchling.
